text: ‘Counter to facts and reality’: China, Mexico, Canada respond to Trump tariff threats  —  Officials in China, Mexico and Canada criticized Tuesday a pledge made by President-elect Donald Trump on social media to impose new tariffs on all three of the United States' largest trading partners on the first day of his presidency.
